rules.description: Press left command key alone to F13 key
Press left command key alone to F14 key
japanese_kana + U/O Crtl Version : excluded VSCode, iTerm2
japanese_kana + IJKL YH UO → arrow Delete BackSpace Home End
japanese_eisuu + rows of Q and A → Number and Sign keys
Press Left Command or Eisuu and Space, Launch Spotlight without IME
Underscore + E to open Microsoft Edge
Underscore + V to open VS Code
Underscore + Shift + V to open Cisco VPN
Underscore + F to open Focus To-Do
